question: What is the theme of 2019 World Day of Social Justice?
option1: Preventing conflict and sustaining peace through decent work
option3: If You Want Peace & Development, Work for Social Justice
option4: A Just Transition – environmentally sustainable economies and societies
answer: If You Want Peace & Development, Work for Social Justice
explanation: The World Day of Social Justice is observed every year on February 20 to recognize the need to promote efforts to tackle issues such as poverty, exclusion and unemployment. The day focuses on the plight of social injustice throughout the world and presses for improvements and solutions. The 2019 theme is “If You Want Peace & Development, Work for Social Justice”.
